The storage capacity of the instance. Unit: GB.

The ID of the vSwitch to which the instance connects to.

*   Month

The subscription duration of the instance.

*   If PricingCycle is set to Month, set this parameter to an integer that ranges from 1 to 9.
*   If PricingCycle is set to Year, set this parameter to an integer that ranges from 1 to 3.

The disk type of TSDB for InfluxDB️®️.

*   cloud_efficiency: ultra disk
*   cloud_ssd: standard SSD.
*   cloud_essd: ESSD cloud_auto: ESSD AutoPL disk

schema.description: The ID of the instance.

Status.description: The status of the instance. Valid values: ACTIVATION, CREATING, NET_CREATING, CLASS_CHANGING, LOCKED, and DELETED. ACTIVATION indicates that the instance is running. CREATING indicates that the instance is being created. NET_CREATING indicates that a network connection to the instance is being created. CLASS_CHANGING indicates that the configuration of the instance is being modified. LOCKED indicates that the instance is locked. DELETED indicates that the instance is deleted.

PaymentType.description: The billing method of the instance. Valid values: PREPAY and POSTPAY. The PREPAY value indicates the subscription billing method. The POSTPAY value indicates the pay-as-you-go billing method.

VswitchId.description: The ID of the vSwitch to which the instance connects.

CreateTime.description: The timestamp when the instance is created.

MemSize.description: The memory size of the instance. This parameter is returned only if the instance is a TSDB for InfluxDB®️ instance.

CpuNumber.description: The number of CPU cores of the instance.

ChargeType.description: The billing method of the instance. Valid values: PREPAY and POSTPAY. The PREPAY value indicates the subscription billing method. The POSTPAY value indicates the pay-as-you-go billing method.

PublicConnectionString.description: The public endpoint of the instance. You can use the public endpoint to access the instance over the Internet.

NetworkType.description: The network type of the instance.

MaxTimelineLimit.description: The number of time series supported by the instance. This parameter is returned only if the instance is a TSDB instance.

DiskCategory.description: The disk type of the instance. For a TSDB for InfluxDB®️ instance, the valid values are cloud_efficiency and cloud_ssd. The cloud_efficiency value indicates ultra disks. The cloud_ssd value indicates standard SSDs.

InstanceTps.description: The transactions per second (TPS) of the instance. Unit: TPS.

GmtExpire.description: The time when the instance expires. This parameter is returned only when the instance uses the subscription billing method. The time is in the yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss format.

EngineType.description: The engine type of the instance. Valid values: tsdb_tsdb, tsdb_influxdb, and tsdb1.5. The tsdb_tsdb value indicates the OpenTSDB engine. The tsdb_influxdb value indicates the InfluxDB®️ engine. The tsdb1.5 value indicates the tsdb1.5 engine.

AutoRenew.description: Indicates whether auto-renewal is enabled for the instance that uses the subscription billing method.

InstanceStorage.description: The storage capacity of the instance. Unit: GB.

RegionId.description: The ID of the region in which the instance is located.

GmtCreated.description: The time when the instance is created. The time is in the yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss format.

ExpiredTime.description: The timestamp when the instance expires. This parameter is returned only when the instance uses the subscription billing method.

ZoneId.description: The ID of the zone in which the instance is deployed.

InstanceStatus.description: The status of the instance. Valid values: ACTIVATION, CREATING, NET_CREATING, CLASS_CHANGING, LOCKED, and DELETED. ACTIVATION indicates that the instance is running. CREATING indicates that the instance is being created. NET_CREATING indicates that a network connection to the instance is being created. CLASS_CHANGING indicates that the configuration of the instance is being modified. LOCKED indicates that the instance is locked. DELETED indicates that the instance is deleted.

Series.description: The edition of the TSDB for InfluxDB®️ instance. Valid values: 0 and 1. The 0 value indicates the Standard Edition. The 1 value indicates the High-availability Edition.

SecurityIpList.description: The IP address whitelist of the instance.

Ip.description: The IP address in the whitelist of the instance.

DescribeHiTSDBInstance.title: DescribeHiTSDBInstance
DescribeHiTSDBInstance.summary: Queries the details about a Time Series Database (TSDB) instance.

schema.description: The states of the instances you want to query. Specify this parameter in the JSON format. The InstanceStatus parameter enumerates the instances of the specified states.
The number of the page to return.
The number of instances to return on each page.

The engine type of the instances that you want to query. Valid values: tsdb_tsdb and tsdb_influxdb. The tsdb_tsdb value indicates the OpenTSDB engine. The tsdb_influxdb value indicates the InfluxDB®️ engine.
The ID of the request.

RequestId.description: The page number of the returned page.

PageNumber.description: The number of instances returned on each page.

PageSize.description: The total number of returned instances.

InstanceList.description: The status of the instance. Valid values: ACTIVATION, CREATING, NET_CREATING, CLASS_CHANGING, LOCKED, and DELETED. ACTIVATION: The instance is running. CREATING: The instance is being created. NET_CREATING: A network connection is being established. CLASS_CHANGING: The configuration of the instance is being modified. LOCKED: The instance is locked. DELETED: The instance is deleted.

VpcId.description: The billing method of the instance. Valid values: PREPAY and POSTPAY. The PREPAY value indicates the subscription billing method. The POSTPAY value indicates the pay-as-you-go billing method.

PaymentType.description: The maximum number of time series that can be stored in a database.

MaxSeriesPerDatabase.description: The engine type of the instance. Valid values: tsdb_tsdb and tsdb_influxdb. The tsdb_tsdb value indicates the OpenTSDB engine. The tsdb_influxdb value indicates the InfluxDB®️ engine.

InstanceClass.description: The timestamp when the instance was created.

CreateTime.description: The billing method of the instance. Valid values: PREPAY and POSTPAY. The PREPAY value indicates the subscription billing method. The POSTPAY value indicates the pay-as-you-go billing method.

UserId.description: The storage capacity of the instance. Unit: GB.

InstanceStorage.description: The network type of the instance. The VPC value indicates a virtual private cloud (VPC).

InstanceId.description: Indicates whether the instance is locked. Valid values: 0 and 1. The value 0 indicates that the instance is not locked. The value 1 indicates that the instance is locked.

InstanceDescription.description: The region ID of the instance.

RegionId.description: The time when the instance was created. The time is in the yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss format.

InstanceAlias.description: The transactions per second (TPS) of the instance. Unit: TPS.

InstanceTps.description: The timestamp when the instance expires. This parameter is returned only when the instance uses the subscription billing method.

ExpiredTime.description: The ID of the zone in which the instance is deployed.

ZoneId.description: The state of the instance. The value of this parameter is an enumerated string.

InstanceStatus.description: The time when the instance expires. This parameter is returned only when the instance uses the subscription billing method. The time is in the yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss format.

}","errorExample":""},{"type":"xml","example":"<DescribeRegionsResponse>
